description:
From airplane travel, to daytime napping in a hammock, the Eye Shades help you snooze when it's light out.

  • Contoured microfiber lining for comfort
  • Nose baffle and adjustable strap ensure a perfect fit and light-free sleep
  • Packs down small for ultra-light travelling
  • Washable and reusable
  • Set of earplugs included
name: Sea To Summit Eye Shades
